text: 12:45 Hibru 6:4; 2 Pita 2:20-22Egh duar kurar kam mangɨ, 7plan duar kurar a gafiragha arazir kurabagh amiba, men aku izam. Egh me mangɨ, dɨpenir kamɨn ikiam. Gumazir kam faragha paza ike, egh a datɨrɨghɨn bar pazavɨra ikiam, eghtɨ an dabirabim a faragha ikezir dabirabim bar a gafiragh bar ikuvigham. Arazir kamaghɨram amim, gumazamizir kurar datɨrɨghɨn itiba uaghan me bativam, eghtɨ me bar pazavɨra ikiam. Eghtɨ men dabirabim, faragha ikezir dabirabim bar a gafiragh bar ikuvigham.”
